thread.title: A beautifully designed hotel, centrally located
thread.title_full: A beautifully designed hotel, centrally located - Review of Viceroy Central Park New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Mike R
title: A beautifully designed hotel, centrally located
text:
I had a wonderful stay here. The staff is incredibly warm and helpful, and the space itself is beautifully designed. The food is great, the bed is comfortable - I slept very well.
It's centrally located, but not in the mess of Times Square - just north, which makes it easier to get around.
Recommended for anyone who wants a beautiful space for work or pleasure, and doesn't want to be in the middle of the noise of the city.
